name: Balanced Diet
description:
"Balanced Diet" is a simple puzzle game that uses the Leap Motion controller to allow a player to control a food tray and challenges them to catch and balance food items!

Features:

  • 7 food items including: oranges, sandwiches, coffee, and milk
  • 8 levels (some quite difficult!)

Update:

  • The version we submitted has a bug in which the square sandwiches were blue! So we're uploading a revised version for people who want to play with properly coloured sandwiches.
  • Second update. Adding contributors file.

Notes:

  • This game is based on the stacking game from Wario Ware Smooth Moves for Nintendo Wii. (That game is awesome!)
  • It was made over a weekend for the Leap Motion / IndieCade 3D Jam. Thanks to Off Peak Games, James Strauss, and Matt Stentiford for jamming with us!
